page.title: 15THE CHURCH OF ST JAMES
page.content: The church is called St.James. It was built in 1385. The church is made of stone and bricks. Mr. Moore is the vicar untill the real one comes. It has a grave yard around the church. Once one of the steeples fell down becuse it was struck by lightning. Their are six bells up the tower. The people take turns in ringing the bells. The church has just been painted inside a creamy colour. Inside the church the seats are all made of wood. There is a path running from the church through the grave yard to the chapel. There are two church wardens Mrs. Mather and Mr. Clinch. The church is one of the oldest buildings in the village. There is a parish room right next to the church where they play skittles. The parish room is in need of repair work.
